sessions.description: Aggregation of session information from the non-admin request table.

columns.name: session_id
columns.description: Unique session ID, taken from the requests table.

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: Timestamp of the first request in the session.

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: Timestamp of the last request in the session.

columns.name: duration_ms
columns.description: Elapsed time in milliseconds between the first and last requests.

columns.name: unique_urls
columns.description: Count of unique urls visited during the session.

columns.name: request_count
columns.description: Total number of requests in the session. This includes automated traffic.

columns.name: unique_courses
columns.description: Number of different courses visited during the session.

columns.name: unique_quizzes
columns.description: Number of different quizzes visited during the session.

columns.name: unique_discussions
columns.description: Number of different discussions visited during the session.

columns.name: unique_conversations
columns.description: Number of different conversations visited during the session.

columns.name: unique_assignments
columns.description: Number of different assignments visited during the session.

columns.name: unique_ips
columns.description: Number of different IP addresses used during this session.

columns.name: main_ip
columns.description: IP address used most frequently during this session.
